name: qr-menu-master
description: QR Menu Master - Unified Restaurant Ordering System

scripts.dev:customer: concurrently "cd admin-client && npm run dev:customer" "cd unified-server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd admin-client && npm run build && cd ../unified-server && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd unified-server && npm install && cd ../admin-client && npm install
scripts.clean: cd unified-server && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../admin-client && rm -rf node_modules dist
